game.beginning: In a world ravaged by an ancient cataclysm, humanity has fragmented into city-states ruled by powerful sorcerers known as the Archons.
game.ending: The player's journey culminates in a final showdown with the enigmatic leader of the Archons, who holds the key to the world's salvation or destruction.
game.synopsis: In "Echoes of Eternity," players take on the role of an ancient being reborn into a world of magic and technology. With the ability to wield the elements and harness ancient technologies, they must navigate treacherous landscapes, forge alliances with rival city-states, and unravel the mysteries of their past to prevent the impending apocalypse.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
